lead_paragraph: Edwin Rodriguez enjoyed a successful debut as interim manager of the Florida Marlins, who got home runs from Gaby Sanchez and Jorge Cantu in a 7-5 comeback victory over the host Baltimore Orioles.
snippet: Edwin Rodriguez enjoyed a successful debut as interim manager of the Florida Marlins, who got home runs from Gaby Sanchez and Jorge Cantu in a 7-5 comeback victory over the host Baltimore Orioles.
